aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by actions based on the allowed set of values for each of the tags

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by actions based on tag-value associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by actions based on the presence of mandatory tags in the request

redshift:ConsumerIdentifier.description: Filters access by the datashare consumer

redshift:DbName.description: Filters access by the database name

redshift:DbUser.description: Filters access by the database user name

redshift:DurationSeconds.description: Filters access by the number of seconds until a temporary credential set expires
